violations.title: Pre-consent Tracking Script Execution
violations.description: Tracking scripts executed before user consent obtained
violations.businessImpact: Unlawful processing of personal data, potential fines up to â‚¬20M
violations.remediation: Implement consent-gated script loading using CMP integration

violations.title: Pre-consent Third-party Requests
violations.description: Third-party tracking requests initiated before consent
violations.businessImpact: Data sharing without legal basis, potential GDPR fines
violations.remediation: Implement server-side consent verification for third-party integrations

violations.title: Consent Bypass Vulnerability
violations.description: Technical methods detected to bypass consent mechanism
violations.businessImpact: Systematic GDPR violations, potential criminal liability
violations.remediation: Implement server-side consent validation and audit trails

violations.title: Consent Mechanism Not Functional
violations.description: Accept consent does not activate agreed tracking technologies
violations.businessImpact: CMP implementation failure, consent framework invalid
violations.remediation: Debug and fix consent signal propagation to tracking scripts

details.details: Accept consent did not activate any additional tracking

violations.title: Identical Tracking Regardless of Choice
violations.description: Same tracking behavior whether user accepts or rejects
violations.businessImpact: Consent choices meaningless, potential regulatory investigation
violations.remediation: Implement differential tracking based on user consent

recommendations.action: Implement consent-gated loading for all tracking technologies
Debug and fix consent mechanism functionality
recommendations.impact: Makes consent choices meaningful and legally valid

legalAnalysis.regulatoryAction: Regulatory investigation risk if user complaints filed. Priority remediation advised.
